articles.title: Oscars 2022: What time, what channel and how to watch the best-picture nominees before statuettes are handed out
articles.content: Here's everything you need to know before tuning in to the Academy Awards: what time the Oscars start, what channel the show is on and who is hosting.

articles.title: Landmark EU law could take billions from Apple, and already forced a major change at Google
articles.content: The Digital Markets Act is set to take effect next year, and is likely to free developers from onerous commission fees charged by Apple, Google and other major app platforms, potentially costing Apple billions of dollars on its own.

articles.title: Europe's new Big Tech law could actually produce results, like iMessage and Facebook Messenger playing nicely and big-money fines
articles.content: Big Tech companies should be quaking in their boots, after the EU passed a provisional new Digital Markets Act that could result in far heftier fines for violations.

articles.title: U.S. Oil Fund outperforms while ETFs remain ensnared in Russia-Ukraine war fallout
articles.content: Against the backdrop of Russia’s ongoing attack on Ukraine and the beginning of the Federal Reserve’s interest rate hike cycle, the top performer over the past week is the U.S. Oil Fund LP, according to FactSet data. Meanwhile, trading of Russia-focused ETFs remained halted even though the Russian stock market partially reopened Thursday.

articles.content: A new tech stock bull run could be at hand.

articles.title: Tech Sector +7 To +8% The Last 2 Weeks: Still Facing Tough Compares From Q1 And Q2 '21
